name: Christmas Eve at the Spiders Hotel
name_original: Christmas Eve at the Spiders Hotel
description:
A short Narrative Violence Experience.

It's the night before Christmas, and guests at the Spiders Hotel are counting on you to deliver their holiday cheer.

You have a sack full of gifts. You have an eight-round gun. You have a friend in your ear with a plan.

Christmas is coming.

  • Warning: Spiders. Lots of spiders. Spiders are honestly the main thing here.
  • Expected playtime: 15 minutes.

Made for 7DFPS 2022.

Features environment art from Dokyo, Next Level 3D and Twinmotion. Features art and sound effects from Adia Entertainment.
